惉字的基本解释

惉
zhān
〔惉懘（
ch?）〕ａ．（声音）不和谐，如“五者（宫、商、角、徴、羽）不乱，则无惉惉之音矣。”ｂ．敝败，如“惉惉残疆，耻辱不恤如此。”ｃ．烦乱，如“借使小有惉惉之情，悴于胸次，忧思郁结，易以伤气。”

惉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhān］
［《集韻》處占切，平鹽，昌。］
不和谐，烦乱。

惉字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　惉； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页390第06
【集韻】處占切【韻會】【正韻】蚩占切，?音襜。【說文】惉懘，煩聲也。【集韻】或作怗苫，亦書作㤐。俗作?，非。【史記·樂書】五者不亂，則無惉懘之音。【樂記】作怗。

惉字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
惉字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
zhān
〔惉懘(
ch?)] a. (Voice) Disharmony, such as "the five (gong, shang, angle, 徴, and feather) are not chaotic, there is no sound of shame." b. Lost, such as "I feel shameful and disgraceful." c. Disturbance, such as "If there is a little feeling of sorrow, it will be haggard in the chest, melancholy and depressed, and it will be easy to hurt the breath."
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhān］
["Ji Yun" Chu Zhanqi, Pingyan, Chang. ]
Disharmony, upset.
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　惉; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 390 06
[Ji Yun] Chu Zhanqi [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Chi Zhanqi,? Yin Xun. [Said the text] Confusion, annoying. [Ji Yun] Or as a 怗苫, also a book as a 㤐. Popular work?, non. 【Historical Records·Book of Music】If the five are not chaotic, there will be no sound of frustration. [Le Ji] Make a fool of yourself.
